attributes.name: Sustainable Agrosystems
attributes.description: Sustainable and regenerative agriculture, fishing, and aquaculture as well as manufacturing of derived subproducts.

attributes.name: Tourism and Recreation
attributes.description: Accommodation, travel, transportation, hospitality, visitor experiences and eco-tourism projects.

attributes.name: Forestry and Agroforestry
attributes.description: Sustainable timber extraction and forest management practices, including reforestation and restoration.

attributes.name: Non Timber Forest Production
attributes.description: Production of health, wellness, and cosmetic products; art, clothing, and handcrafted products; production of food and drinks.
